trans-unit.source: Displays realty objects in the FE
Static SQL filter (will be appended to the WHERE clause using " AND "):
E-mail address for contact requests if the realty object's contact data cannot be used:
E-mail address for a blind carbon copy of each request:
note concerning the law against unfair competition
Show link to the contact form in the favorites view:
DB field to create the search filter checkboxes from:
DB fields by which a FE user can sort the list view:
Page with the FE image upload:
Page with list of objects by one owner:
FE user groups for the offerer list:
FE page displayed after saving a FE-created record:
E-mail address that receives a message when a new record has been FE-created:
Show Google Maps in list view:
Target page for the search widget:
Price ranges for the price selector:
Contact data to show for all FE user groups:
FE user groups with different contact data:
Contact data to show for these FE user groups:
link to page with list of objects by one owner
GET parameter for the object UID:
Price for buying the garage/parking space

We offer you the following objects:

You cannot enter any more objects.
You can enter one more object.

No results were found with these search parameters. Please try refining your search.

Your favorites list currently is empty.
The object you requested contact for does not exist.
The object you requested contact for does not exist.
The object does not exist in the database. Please choose another object or enter a new one.
The object does not exist in the database. Please choose another object or enter a new one.
You can only upload images for a specified realty object. Click the image upload button in the "my objects" list.
This URL is invalid. The object to be shown in the detail view is not available. Please contact the web master.
This URL is invalid. The object to be shown in the detail view is not available. Please contact the web master.
You do not have any objects.
You do not have any objects.
There are no offerers to display.
This offerer currently does not have any objects.
You do not have access to the editing mode for this object. Only this object's owner may edit this record.
You do not have access to the editing mode for this object. Only this object's owner may edit this record.
This image is not available in our databases. Please check that the address you've entered is correct. If you have followed a link to this page, the link might be incorrect or out of date.
This image is not available in our databases. Please check that the address you've entered is correct. If you have followed a link to this page, the link might be incorrect or out of date.
Please log in to view this page.
Please log in to view this page.
You have reached the number of objects you are allowed to enter and cannot enter any more objects.
Here you can write a message to the offerer.
Here you can write a message to the offerer.
We are using the contact data from your account here.
We are using the contact data from your account here.
Please arrange a date for viewing the object with me.
Please send me some information material.
I have read and agree to the %s terms %s.
If you would like us to call you back, please give us explicit permission to do so.
The request cannot be sent because no contact person was entered for this object.
Please provide your name without special characters.
Please provide your name without special characters.
Please provide a valid e-mail address.
Please provide a valid e-mail address.
For processing your request, we need you to explicitly accept our terms and conditions. Please check the checkbox below.
The following objects were on the requester's favorites list:
Do you really want to delete this record?
Please enter a year that lies in the past.
Please enter a valid longitude degree (-180 to 180).
Please enter a valid latitude degree (-90 to 90).
The entered object number already exists in the database. Please enter a different object number.
Please enter a value for this field.
The provided value is not within the set of allowed values.
Please enter a valid price because this is an object to buy.
Please enter a valid price or leave this field empty.
Please enter a valid price for net rent per year, rent with heating costs or rent excluding bills as this is an object to rent.
Please enter a valid price for net rent per year, rent with heating costs or rent excluding bills or leave these fields empty.
A new and an existing record cannot be stored for the same object. Please either select an existing record or provide a new title.
A new realty record has been created in the FE.
A new record has been added to the database.
The image you have tried to upload is too large. Please choose a smaller one or scale this image and try again.
The image you have tried to upload is of an invalid file type. Allowed extensions are: JPG, JPEG, GIF, PNG.
Please provide a caption for the image.
The selected offerer does not exist in the database.
Contact data source (for contact form and detail view)
This task runs the OpenImmo import. You can configure the import in the extension manager.
This task cleans up orphaned image and document files that have been left after the OpenImmo import.
